args.query: Let f : (a,b) -> R continuous differentiable on (a,b) \ {c} limit of f' at c exists then f' at c equals L

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Set Filter

theorem jirilebl_ra_ch_der_1129 {a b c L : ℝ} (ha : a < c) (hb : c < b) {f : ℝ → ℝ}
  (hcont : ContinuousOn f (Ioo a b))
  (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (hder : ∀ x, x ∈ (Ioo a b \\ {c}) → HasDerivAt f (g x) x)
  (hlim : Tendsto (fun x => g x) (nhdsWithin c (Ioo a b \\ {c})) (nhds L)) :
  HasDerivAt f L c := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Set Filter

theorem jirilebl_ra_ch_der_1129 {a b c L : ℝ} (ha : a < c) (hb : c < b) {f : ℝ → ℝ}
  (hcont : ContinuousOn f (Ioo a b))
  (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (hder : ∀ x, x ∈ (Ioo a b \ {c}) → HasDerivAt f (g x) x)
  (hlim : Tendsto (fun x => g x) (nhdsWithin c (Ioo a b \ {c})) (nhds L)) :
  HasDerivAt f L c := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Set Filter

theorem jirilebl_ra_ch_der_1129 {a b c L : ℝ} (ha : a < c) (hb : c < b) {f : ℝ → ℝ}
  (hcont : ContinuousOn f (Ioo a b))
  (hdiff : DifferentiableOn ℝ f (Ioo a b \ {c}))
  (hlim : Tendsto (fun x => deriv f x) (nhdsWithin c (Ioo a b \ {c})) (nhds L)) :
  DifferentiableAt ℝ f c ∧ deriv f c = L := by sorry
